src.streamlit.app_nlp module¶

src.streamlit.app_nlp.keyword_extraction(text: str, kw_model: KeyBERT, nr_candidates: int, top_n: int) → list[tuple[str, float]]¶

This function extracts keywords from the input text

Parameters:

  • text (str) – Input sentence

  • kw_model (KeyBERT) – KeyBERT pipeline

  • nr_candidates (int) – Number of candidates

  • top_n (int) – Number of keywords to extract

Returns:

List of keywords and their weights

Return type:

list[tuple[str, float]]

Returns:

KeyBERT pipeline
